00029 from Koo.Common import Common
00030 from Koo.Common import Shortcuts
00031 
00032 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00033 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldDelegate import *
00034 from Koo.Common.Calendar import *
00035 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00036 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00037 from PyQt4.uic import *
00038 
00039 (DateFieldWidgetUi, DateFieldWidgetBase ) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('calendar.ui') ) 
00040 
00041 class DateFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, DateFieldWidgetUi):
00042         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00043                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00044                 DateFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00045                 self.setupUi(self)
00046 
00047                 # Add shortcut
00048                 self.scSearch = QShortcut( self.uiDate )
00049                 self.scSearch.setKey( Shortcuts.SearchInField )
00050                 self.scSearch.setContext( Qt.WidgetShortcut )
00051                 self.connect( self.scSearch, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.showCalendar )
00052 
00053                 self.connect( self.pushCalendar, SIGNAL( "clicked()" ),self.showCalendar )
00054                 self.dateTime = False
00055                 self.connect( self.uiDate, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00056                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiDate )
00057 
00058         def updateValue(self):
00059                 self.modified()
00060                 self.showValue()
00061 
00062         def menuEntries(self):
00063                 return [ (_('Set current date'), self._setCurrentDate, True ) ] 
00064 
00065         def _setCurrentDate( self ):
00066                 self.uiDate.setText( dateToText( QDate.currentDate() ) )
00067 
00068         def colorWidget(self):
00069                 return self.uiDate
00070 
00071         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00072                 AbstractFieldWidget.setReadOnly(self, value)
00073                 self.uiDate.setReadOnly( value )
00074                 self.pushCalendar.setEnabled( not value )
00075 
00076         def value(self):
00077                 date = textToDate( self.uiDate.text() )
00078                 if not date.isValid():
00079                         return False
00080                 return dateToStorage(date)
00081 
00082         def store(self):
00083                 # We've found in account.reconcile model that the date widget
00084                 # is used to show a datetime field. The field is read-only, but when we
00085                 # call store() it's stored without time information and this causes the 
00086                 # record to be marked as modified. So we ensure the field is not stored
00087                 # if it's read-only. We do it in this field only to avoid regressions 
00088                 # with other models of the ERP.
00089                 if self.isReadOnly():
00090                         return
00091                 self.record.setValue(self.name, self.value())
00092 
00093         def clear(self):
00094                 self.uiDate.clear()
00095         
00096         def showValue(self):
00097                 # Ensure record is valid given the function can be called from self.updateValue()
00098                 if not self.record:
00099                         self.clear()
00100                         return
00101                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00102                 if value:
00103                         self.setText( dateToText( storageToDate( value ) ) )
00104                 else:
00105                         self.clear()
00106 
00107         def showCalendar(self):
00108                 popup = PopupCalendarWidget( self.uiDate, self.dateTime )
00109                 self.connect( popup, SIGNAL('selected()'), self.store )
00110 
00111         def setText(self, text):
00112                 self.uiDate.setText( text )
00113                 self.uiDate.setCursorPosition( 0 )
00114 
00115 class DateTimeFieldWidget( DateFieldWidget ):
00116         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00117                 DateFieldWidget.__init__( self, parent, model, attrs=attrs)
00118                 self.dateTime = True
00119 
00120         def menuEntries(self):
00121                 return [ (_('Set current date and time'), self._setCurrentDateTime, True ) ]    
00122 
00123         def _setCurrentDateTime( self ):
00124                 self.uiDate.setText( dateTimeToText( QDateTime.currentDateTime() ) )
00125 
00126         def value(self):
00127                 datetime = textToDateTime( self.uiDate.text() )
00128                 if not datetime.isValid():
00129                         return False
00130                 return  str(dateTimeToStorage( datetime ))
00131         
00132         def clear(self):
00133                 self.uiDate.clear()
00134 
00135         def showValue(self):
00136                 # Ensure record is valid given the function can be called from self.updateValue()
00137                 if not self.record:
00138                         self.clear()
00139                         return
00140                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00141                 if value:
00142                         self.setText( dateTimeToText( storageToDateTime(value) ) )
00143                 else:
00144                         self.clear()

00147 # There are currently no server modules using the time datatype.
00148 class TimeFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00149         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00150                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00151                 self.uiTime = QLineEdit( self )
00152                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00153                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00154                 layout.addWidget( self.uiTime )
00155                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiTime )
00156                 self.connect( self.uiTime, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00157 
00158         def updateValue(self):
00159                 self.modified()
00160                 self.showValue()
00161 
00162         def menuEntries( self ):
00163                 return [ (_('Set current time'), self.setCurrentTime, True ) ]
00164 
00165         def setCurrentTime( self ):
00166                 self.setText( timeToText( QTime.currentTime() ) )
00167 
00168         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00169                 AbstractFieldWidget.setReadOnly(self, value)
00170                 self.uiTime.setReadOnly(value)
00171 
00172         def colorWidget(self):
00173                 return self.uiTime
00174 
00175         def value(self):
00176                 time = textToTime( self.uiTime.text() )
00177                 if not time.isValid():
00178                         return False
00179                 return timeToStorage( time )
00180 
00181         def store(self):
00182                 self.record.setValue(self.name, self.value())
00183 
00184         def clear(self):
00185                 self.uiTime.clear()
00186 
00187         def showValue(self):
00188                 # Ensure record is valid given the function can be called from self.updateValue()
00189                 if not self.record:
00190                         self.clear()
00191                         return
00192                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00193                 if value:
00194                         self.setText( timeToText( storageToTime( value ) ) )
00195                 else:
00196                         self.clear()
00197 
00198         def setText(self, text):
00199                 self.uiTime.setText( text )
00200                 self.uiTime.setCursorPosition( 0 )

00202 class FloatTimeFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00203         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00204                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00205                 self.uiTime = QLineEdit( self )
00206                 self.uiTime.setMaxLength( 11 )
00207                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00208                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00209                 layout.addWidget( self.uiTime )
00210                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiTime )
00211                 self.connect( self.uiTime, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00212 
00213         def updateValue(self):
00214                 self.modified()
00215                 self.showValue()
00216 
00217         def menuEntries( self ):
00218                 return [ (_('Set current time'), self.setCurrentTime, True ) ]
00219 
00220         def setCurrentTime( self ):
00221                 self.setText( timeToText( QTime.currentTime() ) )
00222 
00223         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00224                 AbstractFieldWidget.setReadOnly(self, value)
00225                 self.uiTime.setReadOnly(value)
00226 
00227         def colorWidget(self):
00228                 return self.uiTime
00229 
00230         def value(self):
00231                 time = textToFloatTime( self.uiTime.text() )
00232                 if not time.isValid():
00233                         return False
00234                 return timeToStorage( time )
00235 
00236         def store(self):
00237                 self.record.setValue(self.name, textToFloatTime(unicode(self.uiTime.text())) )
00238 
00239         def clear(self):
00240                 self.setText('00:00')
00241 
00242         def showValue(self):
00243                 # Ensure record is valid given the function can be called from self.updateValue()
00244                 if not self.record:
00245                         self.clear()
00246                         return
00247                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00248                 if value:
00249                         self.setText( floatTimeToText( float( value ) ) )
00250                 else:
00251                         self.setText( '00:00' )
00252 
00253         def setText(self, text):
00254                 self.uiTime.setText( text )
00255                 self.uiTime.setCursorPosition( 0 )
00256 
00257 class DateFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00258         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00259                 value = textToDate( editor.text() )
00260                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
00261 
00262 class TimeFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00263         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00264                 value = textToTime( editor.text() )
00265                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
00266

00272 class FloatTimeFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00273         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00274                 value = textToFloatTime( unicode(editor.text()) )
00275                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
